attributes.action: enact legislation making the Inland Revenue accountable to the individual taxpayer in law for acts of incompetence and errors.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is my understanding that the Inland Revenue are in effect above the law in that the taxpayer is unable to press a civil action for acts of incompetence and mismanagement that may in severe cases result in bankruptcy of the individual. The Revenue should be accountable to the public being after all is said and done a public department. We can at least vote out incompetent politicians; not so tax inspectors.
